title: Sermon preached November 3, 1833, in the Church of St. John the Baptist, Belize, in the Bay of Honduras, on the death of Francis Leigh Townley Balfour Esq., clerk of the courts
author: M. Newport
note: by the Rev. M. Newport A.M. Minister of St. John's Church and Chaplin of the garrison of Belize, printed at the request of his friends and executors
